House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07824
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FOR THE MODERNIZATION OF THE PHILIPPINE NATIONAL POLICE, APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Creates a two part modernization program: 1.) Infrastructure Development and Facilities Upgrading; and 2.) Equipment Upgrading and Acquisition Planning; Strengthens the PNP procurement system and procedures.
ALIAS NAME : “PNP Modernization Act of 2017.”
